pageTitle: 5D II tethering with the iPAD: Canon EOS-1D / 5D / 6D Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5983=Immediately when the iPAD was announced (2010-01-27) I was thrilled by the idea of the usage of the iPAD as tethering device for my 5D II. May it be for a bigger and better screen (always seem to fail in adjusting my camera on the tripod a tiny bit with the small 3" screen) or may it be for video control.}
